description: Regional Human Development Report on Social Inclusion

subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: There is currently no standard set of definitions and indicators to measuring social inclusion that is easily transferable to all ECIS country contexts, which reduces the usefulness of this powerful concept as an analytical and policy-making tool. A regional report that develops a common analytical approach to social inclusion applicable from Central Europe to Central Asia and that provides examples of measurements methods as well policy applications for addressing inequality, poverty and social exclusion in a multinational context, would fill an important gap.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: RHDR on Social Inclusion
